registration.title: Create Account
registration.subtitle: Fill in your details to get started
registration.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

errors.emailOrPhoneRequired: Please enter email or phone number
errors.userNotFound: User not found. Please check your details.
errors.emailNotConfirmed: Email not confirmed. Please check your email.
errors.userExists: User already exists. Try logging in.
errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists.
errors.phoneExists: An account with this phone number already exists.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
errors.registrationDisabled: Registration is currently disabled. Please contact administrator.

twoFa.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFa.enterIdentifier: Please enter email or phone number
twoFa.SendedMailConfirmationCode: Verification code sent to your email
twoFa.SendedPhoneNumberConfirmationCode: Verification code sent to your phone
twoFa.SendedLoginCodeToEmail: Login code sent to your email
twoFa.SendedLoginCodeToPhoneNumber: Login code sent to your phone
twoFa.UserAlreadyExists: User already exists. Please try logging in.
twoFa.UserNotFound: User not found. Please check your credentials.
twoFa.UserMailNotConfirmed: Email not confirmed. Please verify your email first.
twoFa.UserPhoneNotConfirmed: Phone number not confirmed. Please verify your phone first.
twoFa.UserPhoneAlreadyExists: This phone number is already registered.
twoFa.InvalidToken: Invalid or expired token. Please try again.
twoFa.UserIsBlocked: Your account has been blocked. Please contact support.
twoFa.RegistrationDisabled: Registration is currently disabled. Please contact administrator.

twoFaVerify.title: Enter Verification Code
twoFaVerify.subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your device

qr.title: QR Code Login
qr.subtitle: Scan the QR code with your mobile device

status.scanWithApp: Scan QR code with your mobile app
status.failedToAuth: Failed to authenticate with QR code

profile.title: Profile
profile.revokeSessionConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this session? This action cannot be undone.

passkeys.title: My Passkeys
passkeys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey? This action cannot be undone.
passkeys.namePromptSubtitle: Enter a name to identify this passkey

consent.title: Authorization Request
consent.description: {{appName}} is requesting access to your account
consent.warning: By clicking "Allow", you grant this application access to the listed permissions. You can revoke this access at any time from your profile.

error.missingClientId: Invalid authorization request: client_id is missing.
error.loadFailed: Failed to load application information. Please try again.

sessions.devicesDescription: Manage your active login sessions. You can revoke sessions from devices you no longer use.
sessions.revokeSessionConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this session? You will be logged out from this device.
sessions.revokeAllWarning: This will log you out from all other devices. Your current session will remain active.
sessions.revokeAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout from other devices?
